instructions: You can open A6PAGE files with FOREVER Artisan (version 6 or later) in Windows. For example, you can open an A6PAGE file by selecting File â†’ Open.

You can also decompress A6PAGE files and extract their contents with a Zip-compression utility. To do this, rename the .a6page file extension as .zip, then extract its contents with a utility, such as Microsoft File Explorer in Windows and Apple Archive Utility in macOS.
